column4: May 14 The U.S. Senate Armed Services Committee on Thursday approved a  2016 defense policy bill that maps out a series of acquisition reforms and adds funding for big weapons programs like Boeing Co's F/A-18 Super Hornets and Lockheed Martin Corp's  F-35 fighter jet.
